ds_id: Elon Musk, Mark Zuckerberg's fight started before Meta's Twitter rival@The Washington Post@2023-06-24 17:34:29.940808@Meta
data_content: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg has stepped up his efforts to appeal to tech enthusiasts and industry leaders by taking on a more relatable image. This strategy, intended to present Zuckerberg as a progressive innovator, has been in the works for several years as he vies for relevance against figures like Elon Musk. Recently, Zuckerberg has made appearances on popular podcasts and shared images of his personal life and hobbies on social media. He has even accepted a challenge from Musk for a cage fight. Amid struggles at Meta, these actions could also signal an attempt to win back the respect of his employees and the public. As part of the strategy, Zuckerberg has been positioned as Meta's primary storyteller, announcing new products himself and engaging with journalists and notable influencers.
